alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 5:55PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...SOME SLIPPERY SPOTS POSSIBLE THIS EVENING ON UNTREATED SURFACES... Temperatures have slightly decreased across parts of Orange County NY to near or slightly below freezing. There is potential for some light freezing rain and potential for whatever moisture is leftover to freeze on untreated surfaces. As a result, some icy spots could develop, resulting in locally slippery conditions. There is forecast for some snow or a rain and snow mix to develop later this evening. Motorists should proceed with extra caution when traveling this area this evening. Allow for extra room between vehicles.
